summary: This document consists of administrative count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 5, 2019. It includes official inmate counts by housing unit, an out-count form, and specific inmate roster entries, reflecting standard prison population management procedures on a date shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Gama-Pineda
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with the registration number 85918-054, categorized under 'HOSP' (hospital) with an assignment code 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

persons.name: Harrison
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with the registration number 57084-056, with an assignment code 'TWN DRIVER'.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Standard administrative count of the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing a total census of 762 inmates verified across multiple housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records the official inmate count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 5, 2019, showing a total population of 762 inmates.
An inmate named Gama-Pineda (Reg # 85918-054) is listed with a hospital (HOSP) category and an assignment code noted as 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.
An inmate named Harrison (Reg # 57084-056) is listed with an assignment as a 'TWN DRIVER'.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts, rosters, and out-counts, indicating routine prison operations.
The date of these records is August 5, 2019, which is four days before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the same facility on August 9, 2019.
